steps.title: The Dealer Button
steps.message: The button rotates clockwise each hand. It determines who posts blinds and who acts first.

steps.title: The Blinds
steps.message: Small Blind (SB) and Big Blind (BB) are forced bets. SB is to the left of the dealer, BB is two seats left.

steps.title: Why They're Important
steps.message: Blinds create action. Every hand starts with money in the pot, which gives players incentive to compete.
